title: With Michael in Kyuso, Kenya
creator_credit: David Springbett, Heather MacAndrew and Asterisk Film and Videotape Productions
brief_description: Focuses on the life of a young boy living in a village in Kenya. Shows the role of education, the links between the village and the towns and the impact of technology on employment prospects in the village.
creator_credit_for_label: David Springbett, Heather MacAndrew and Asterisk Film and Videotape Productions
